long_description: The women's Arc'teryx Atom LT is a sleeveless core-heater that hugs the body with efficient synthetic insulation to preserve warmth. The wind- and water-resistant outer shell extends stand-alone use. Outer shell fabric has mechanical stretch for mobility and features great water repellency and wind resistance. Lightweight and compressible, the Atom LT features Coreloft(TM) synthetic insulation; Coreloft is a thermally efficient polyester insulation with excellent loft resilience. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) with Hardface(R) side panels increases active-use breathability and mobility, and decreases bulkiness. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Front zipper features an insulated windflap; collar has a soft, brushed lining that is kind to skin. Laminated hem drawcord; drop-back hem. Zip handwarmer pockets and 1 internal chest pocket. The Arc'teryx Atom LT vest has an athletic fit in a hip-length design.
short_description: The women's Arc'teryx Atom LT is a sleeveless core-heater that hugs the body with efficient synthetic insulation to preserve warmth. The wind- and water-resistant outer shell extends stand-alone use.
